question:
When the positive integer x is divided by 6, the remainder is 4. Each of the following could also be an integer EXCEPT
(A) \(\frac{x}{2}\)
(B) \(\frac{x}{3}\)
(C) \(\frac{x}{7}\)
(D) \(\frac{x}{11}\)
(E) \(\frac{x}{17}\)
